title: Registration in Switzerland: First Steps
description: What to do in your first 2 weeks after arrival

steps.title: Register at the Gemeinde (local administration)
steps.description: Within 14 days of arrival. Take your passport/ID, tenancy contract or housing confirmation, photo, and (if available) insurance documents.
tips: Check opening hours and whether you need an appointment

steps.title: Open a bank account
steps.description: For receiving salary or benefits. Choose a bank (PostFinance, UBS, Raiffeisen), prepare your ID, address confirmation and status letter if needed.

steps.title: Enroll in health insurance
steps.description: Mandatory within 3 months. Choose a model (HMO/Telmed/Standard), a suitable deductible, and check for premium reductions.
